questions_1.question: What is/are the purpose(s) of the torque box?
Options: It provides structural support to various thrust reverser components
The backward movement of the torque box provides space for the blocked airflow to escape
When the thrust reverser is deployed, the torque box moves rearward, thus transmitting the motion of the blocker doors to the pylon tracks
questions_1.correctFeedback:
That's Correct!

You have chosen the correct option.
questions_1.InCorrectFeedback:
That's Incorrect!

You have chosen the wrong option. The valid answer is "All of the above"
